summary: Most PWA installability requirements are implemented: manifest + standalone display, HTML metadata (manifest link, theme-color, iOS web app tags, apple-touch-icon), in-app install prompt UX for Android/iOS, and a service worker with registration done outside the immutable main.tsx. One potential gap is that the required icon image files themselves are not shown as added under frontend/public/assets/generated in the diff summary (only referenced). Additionally, some unrelated styling/theme changes appear to be included.

missing_requirements.requirement: Include and reference proper app icons for PWA + iOS home screen installation (including a maskable icon) using static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated.
missing_requirements.reason: The manifest and index.html reference the required icon paths, but the diff summary does not show the actual PNG icon files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated (only code/text files are listed). If those images are not already present, the requirement would not be fully met.

hallucinated_features.description: Global visual theme/palette and Tailwind configuration changes unrelated to PWA installability.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on adding an installable PWA experience (manifest, metadata, install prompt, service worker, icons) and does not request redesigning global styles or Tailwind theme tokens.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions changes to frontend/src/index.css and frontend/tailwind.config.js)
